name: The Legend of Piatã
description:
Ludum Dare 33 Game

The Legend of Piatã

Save the animals from the cage. You control Piatã ("Man of Stone" in Tupi Guarani, a Brazilian indigenous Language) and must rescue the animals.
A mysterious force calls the awakening of the Piatã.

Controls:

Keyboard:
-Up Arrow: Jump
-Down Arrow: Fall from the Platform

Mouse:
-Swipe Up: Jump
=Swipe Down: Fall from the Platform

Mobile:
-Swipe Up: Jump
=Swipe Down: Fall from the Platform

There are five encaged animals in each level. You must rescue each one, otherwise in the end of the level, the Statue of True will punish you. You can collect the Stone Orbs, if you collect 20 you gain an Stone Armor and can resist one damage.
